name: Cinderella's Woods Nail Salon - Beauty Make-Over Design & Fashion Manicure Dress-Up (Free Maker Games for Girls)
name_original: Cinderella's Woods Nail Salon - Beauty Make-Over Design & Fashion Manicure Dress-Up (Free Maker Games for Girls)
description:
Always start the day with a pretty manicure, right girl?!

With Cinderella's Woods Nail Salon you can design beautiful and unique fashion nails with more detail and fun than ever before. This is the BEST Nail Salon game on the entire App Store!

* Create the latest trends and fashions!
* Paint your nails in dozens of beautiful colors!
* Pretty decorations with full customization!
* Stylish patterns and nail tips!
* Design unique nails on each finger!
* Choose your skin tone!
* Add sparkles or sexy jewelry!
* Save your prettiest manicures so you always have them available!
